channel.description: Recent content in 10GHz on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio

item.title: A dielectric lens for the 10,5GHz band (QO-100)
item.description: In this post, we would like to share our design of a dielectric lens for the 10,5GHz band. It has been optimised for its use with commercial satellite dishes of f/D of 0,4, achieving optimal efficiency with respect to reflector illumination (-12dB of illumination at its edges).
